text: Hi guys, I'm not sure if this question has been asked here in this group, but I am battling to create a custom hover effect for my CTA button. I have tried giving it a class inside the CTA builder to give it a hover effect but nothing happens. I even used `!important` in my CSS to overwrite the default hover styles on HubSpot. It's basically a CTA button with a white background and on hover it should change to a pinkish colour.
Is there a way to automatically get recommended posts based on the current blog posts tag?
